tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    weather_condition VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city_name VARCHAR(255),
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Alerts (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  alert_type VARCHAR(50),
  alert_message TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE InsuranceCoverage (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  coverage_type VARCHAR(50),
  coverage_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherStation (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  station_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  station_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  temperature DECIMAL,
  humidity DECIMAL,
  precipitation DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Alerts (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  station_id INT,
  alert_type VARCHAR(255),
  message TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE InsuranceCoverage (
  coverage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  station_id INT,
  coverage_amount DECIMAL,
  coverage_start_date DATE,
  coverage_end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  wind_speed FLOAT,
  precipitation FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE InsuranceCoverage (
  coverage_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  coverage_amount FLOAT,
  policy_holder VARCHAR,
  risk_level INT
);
